alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 9:07PM CDT until August 09 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... Lawrence County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Annieville, or near Lake Charles State Park, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Imboden... Ravenden... Reyno... College City... Portia... Maynard... Biggers... Strawberry... Lynn... O`Kean... Alicia... Ravenden Springs... Minturn... Annieville... Dalton... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
